ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty

Class LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty.LightLocalizer

  • public class LightLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class perform the light localization and places the robot at the point (0,0). The logic is move the robot until detecting a black line, since there are two light sensor on each side, when there is only one sensor detecting a black line, it implies the heading is off. The robot will adjust the heading by making the two sensor detecting the black line around the same time, and at that moment, set the coordinate on the odometer based on the black line. For the details, refer to the Software Design Document Section 7.2
